text: Lily. She lived with her parents in a cozy little house on the edge of the village. Lily was known for her love of adventure and exploration, often wandering deep into the forest to discover new things. One day, while exploring, Lily came across an oldand rusted key lying on the ground.Intrigued, she picked it upand decided to find out what it unlocked.After searching for hours, she finally found an old chest hidden deep in the forest.She used the key to unlock itand inside, she found a map.
